MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the LL57 postcode area of Bangor, affecting a number of properties in the local area. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10am in order to carry out repair work in safety on the underground cable network , and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:09am on the 15th January 2021.
